name: D'Crossier - L’Forte - Robusto
additionalNotes: D’Crossier L’Forte is the most luxurious and exclusive line offered by the artisanal brand. A limited edition offering – with only 2000 boxes released each year, this handcrafted premium boasts a Costa Rican wrapper that was aged for two years using the best premium, aged, Spanish cedar available. A glimpse under the sheets reveals a blend of Nicaraguan and Dominican Republic long-fillers held in place with an undisclosed binder. This full-bodied blend showcases a delicate, complex, and balanced array of flavors including baking spices, pepper, wood, leather, and cedar providing an elegant and palate awakening experience.
